values.description: Base URL for metadata service API
Base URL for content service API
Base URL for ACL service API
Bearer token for metadata service - OBTAIN MANUALLY BEFORE RUNNING
Bearer token for content service - OBTAIN MANUALLY BEFORE RUNNING
Bearer token for ACL service - OBTAIN MANUALLY BEFORE RUNNING
Current document ID being processed (set by scripts)
Current cabinet ID being processed (set by scripts)
Full NMD sync message (JSON string)
Transformed patch request (JSON string)
Document root array for content service
Flag indicating if this is a first-time sync
Existing extended document from metadata API (if exists)
S3 presigned URL for content upload (from snapshot creation)
Snapshot entity ID (from Content API)
S3 object key for snapshot (used to find snapshot in list)
Document filename with extension
Document file extension
User ID (extracted from NMD message)
